help.permissions.content: Require the following permissions for loan application
help.phone.title: Phone and Device
help.phone.content: This app collects and monitor specific information about your device including your hardware model, operating system and version, unique device identifiers like IMEI and serial number, user profile information to uniquely identify the devices and ensure that unauthorised devices are not able to act on your behalf to prevent frauds.
help.accounts.title: Access To Accounts
help.accounts.content: This app collects and monitors list of account information like account names, account types in your device for credit profile enrichment.
help.contacts.title: Access To Contacts
help.contacts.content: This app collects contact information like number of contacts on the device with a phone number and without a phone number. In addition to it, the app collects other non personal infiormation to understand the risk profile of the user and enable credit facility. This app doesn't upload your contact information like names, phone numbers, email addresses and other personal information to our servers.
help.camera.title: Access To Camera
help.camera.content: Require access to camera to capture documents such as Identity proof, Address Proof and Selfie that are required for loan
help.sms.title: Access to transaction SMS
help.sms.content: This app collects transactional SMS data like sender names, sms body, received time to understand your income, spending patterns and automatically fetch your expenses, bills, credits. We do not read any personal or OTP messages.
help.location.title: Access to Location
help.location.content: This app collects location details to verify your location and current address, to ensure serviceability and to identify unusual activity to prevent against any fraud, we do not collect location when app is in background.
help.loan.businessLoanDescription: Get your business loan approved in 15 minutes
help.loan.content: Get your collateral free loan in 4 easy steps. Just follow the instructions and you are good to go.
help.loan.step1.title: Personal and Business Details
help.loan.step1.description: Please keep the following documents ready
help.loan.step1.linkText: Dont have Udyam Aadhar ? Click here to Get your Udyam Aadhaar in 2 minutes
help.loan.step2.title: Credit Assessment
help.loan.step2.description: We will assess your application and evaluate eligibility considering your CIBIL Score.
help.loan.step3.title: Credit Visit
help.loan.step3.description: One of our representives will visit you at your business location for verification.
help.loan.step3.action: We have scheduled a visit to your store. Please cooperate with our agent.
help.loan.step3.action.done: Your cedit visit is done. Thank you for your cooperation
help.loan.step4.title: Loan offer and Disbursement
help.loan.step4.description: Accept the loan offer, sign the loan agreement and grow your business
help.loan.footer.process: We will do a CIBIL bureau check and
permissions.location.title: Allow 'Novo Loans' to access your location information
permissions.location.message: Location details helps us process tour loan application faster.
permissions.background.title: Allow 'Novo Loans' to access your location even when you are not using the app.
permissions.background.message: Knowing your location details helps us in faster processing of loan collection and repayments.
permissions.camera.title: Allow 'Novo Loans' to take pictures and record video.
permissions.camera.message: Camera access helps in faster upload of documents and easy completion of KYC.
permissions.sms.title: Allow 'Novo Loans' access your transactional SMS.
permissions.sms.message: Analysing your SMS data helps us assess credit faster, specially when you have no or low bureau score
permissions.grantAccess.title: Grant Access
permissions.grantAccess.content: Change permissions in your device's app settings. Give Novo Loans access to SMS, Camera and Location.
permissions.exitConfirmation.title: These permissions are important
permissions.exitConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to exit the App?
